title: Après la nuit
overview: In the heart of a seaside resort, Stéphanie, Camille, Isabelle and Nafissa, victims of a serial rapist, decide to join forces to break the silence. Attacked at home in the middle of the night, they describe the same modus operandi, the same shock. A matter of life or death, they must speak out, louder and louder, to finally be heard by a desperately deaf community. With the help of Karine, a police officer who makes common cause with them, and Romain, Stéphanie's tormented brother, these heroines fight to rebuild themselves and prevent everything from exploding in their lives...
